org.jasig.cas.util

Class AbstractJacksonBackedJsonSerializer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.util.AbstractJacksonBackedJsonSerializer<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, JsonSerializer<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RegisteredServiceJsonSerializer

    public abstract class AbstractJacksonBackedJsonSerializer<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements JsonSerializer<T>
    Generic class to serialize objects to/from JSON based on jackson.
    Since:
    4.1
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
